ygData.subject: Re: Good discussion...I love it!
ygData.msgSnippet: At last one person wich thinks i see all time fixing necro spells , magiciam pets get stronger, only wizards look all time content and fight with all
ygData.messageBody:
<html>
At last one person wich thinks i see all time fixing necro spells ,
magiciam pets get stronger, only wizards look all time content and fight
with all forces against changes? One wise man say "In everchanging
world a looser is one wich never changes" ..<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
At 13.04 19/05/99 -0400, you wrote: <br>
<font size=2><blockquote type=cite cite>First of all, I would like to
thank Drev and Talarin for their informed opinions and for actually
posting something other than "where can I find item X, spell
Y".� Dont worry about telling me I am wrong, I am an
Artist/Technical Illustrator in real life, everyday I am told about how I
do things wrong and I developed a thick skin many,many years ago!
;-)</font><br>
<font size=3>�<br>
</font><font size=2>Secondly, I tend to log on to Everquest VERY early in
the morning here, (5:00 - 6:00 am EST)� so when I connect to the server
there are usually 300-400 people online max.� That means that I can very
effectively solo with my Wizard because there is NO competition for
blues.� I dont know about anybody else, but lately I have been
consistently doing 1 bubble of xp every hour that I play.. I have no idea
if that is good or not, but it is perfectly fine for me because I dont
come anywhere near dying.� I also realize that that may change as I
advance in level, but I tend to move around a lot so I think I should be
fine.� Playing that early also means that it is very difficult to group,
seems like everyone else is out soloing as well...I dont know, maybe its
the time of day?� As well, I have a full time job as Sr. Technical
Illustrator which means that I only play 2 hours or so a day, so I am not
expecting to be 20th level already.</font><br>
<font size=3>�<br>
</font><font size=2>Actually what truly baffles me is why some people
seem so dead set against getting Verant to change Wizard spells.� Whats
wrong with fixing something thats broken?� Everyday they keep patching
non-working aspects of this game and yet noone seems to care enough to
fix Wizard spells, probably because noone complains enough.� Or instead
of fixing spells, replace useless ones with some of those beautiful
Teleport Other (or was it Tap Affinity?) spells that were mentioned here
a while ago.� Awesome.� Fits right in with class description and people
would be clamouring for Wizards to be in their group, even at the lower
levels.</font><br>
<font size=3>�<br>
</font><font size=2>Well I was going to get in to which spells should be
changed and why, but I have yammered on too long as it is.� So I will
save it for another post =)</font><br>
<font size=3>�<br>
</font><font size=2>Alhassim 9th Level Erudite Wizard of
E'ci</font><br>
��������������� ^ (see that number...its still going up!� woo hoo!)<br>
</blockquote><br>
</html>
